pr_title: Stopping Pair<L, R> of implementation package from leaking into public surface area

timeline.message: Removing Pair<L, R> of implementation package from leaking into public surface area for readMany API

timeline.bodyText:
@kushagraThapar this is a new public api
FYI
timeline.author: moderakh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,50 @@

+
+package com.azure.cosmos.models;
+
+/**
+ * Encapsulates the PartitionKey/id tuple that uniquely identifies a CosmosItem
+ */
+public class CosmosItemIdentity {

replies.bodyText: We should mark this as final class.
replies.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.bodyText: @FabianMeiswinkel shouldn't this class be marked with BETA annotation?
timeline.author: moderakh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,50 @@
+// Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
+// Licensed under the MIT License.
+
+package com.azure.cosmos.models;
+
+/**
+ * Encapsulates the PartitionKey/id tuple that uniquely identifies a CosmosItem
+ */
+public class CosmosItemIdentity {

replies.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.bodyText: These APIs are also in implementation layer, we have ability to still improve them. Shouldn't we change their signature to take CosmosItemIdentity ?
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText: No - I left this intentionally to not break Adobe. Sounds like we told Adobe to take a dependency on this implementation package class. Whoever worked with Adobe on this needs to follow up with them and ask them to move to the ReadMany Api in the public surface area - only then we will be able to delete this class.
replies.author: FabianMeiswinkel

timeline.bodyText: These APIs are also in implementation layer, we have ability to still improve them. Shouldn't we change their signature to take CosmosItemIdentity ?
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

Whoever worked with Adobe on this needs to follow up with them and ask them to move to the ReadMany Api in the public surface area - only then we will be able to delete this class.

timeline.message: Fixing build error due to corrupt link after spring data samples were moved
Fixing unit test failure due to conversion error in ItemOperations
